fullplot: What Maisie Knew is a contemporary New York City revisioning of the Henry James novel by the same name. It revolves around unwitting 7-year-old Maisie, caught in the middle of a custody battle between her mother Susanna, an aging rock star, and her father, Beale, a major art dealer.
plot: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.
title: What Maisie Knew

tomatoes.consensus: It's undeniably difficult to watch at times, but What Maisie Knew ultimately rises on the strength of its solidly sourced script, powerful performances, and empathetic direction.

writers: Henry James (based on the novel by)
